column_description: Unique identifier for each team assignment, serves as primary key of this table, cannot be NULL.
value_description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) used to distinguish each record.

column_description: Foreign key referencing the uuid of the team table, linking this assignment to a specific team.
value_description: References a team by its unique identifier from the team table.

column_description: Foreign key referencing the uuid of the employee table, linking this assignment to an employee. There can be multiple employee_id assigned to one team_id.
value_description: References an employee by their unique identifier from the employee table.
